articles.title: Yedomon Ange Bovys Zoclanclounon
articles.contents: I am from Benin, a western African country. I have got a Master of Science degree in plant pathology and crop protection from the University of Cheikh Anta Diop of Dakar. I am currently doing a Ph.D. at Jeonbuk National University in the Republic of South Korea. My previous work focused on the identification of promising pearl millet genotypes that harbour resistance against downy mildew [Sclerospora graminicola (Sacc.) J. Schröt., (1886)]. Now I am working in plant genomics domain with a focus on high-quality genome construction of both wild and cultivated sesame. My work is highly dominated by bioinformatics. I love playing with the programming languages such as perl, java with a great interest in R.

articles.title: An artile
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
